==Descriptions==
{{Description|A lush mountain ridge in southern [[Fontaine]] that's widely acclaimed for its beauty yet rarely visited by locals and tourists alike. The Melusine village, the [[Merusea Village]], is hidden beneath its mountains and lakes. Legends have it that the tall mountains are what remains of the giant beast [[Elynas (NPC)|Elynas]]. Erosion from wind and dust has transformed the body of the beast into a home for countless souls.|[[Expedition]] description}}

==Trivia==
*There is a hilichurl hut southeast of the region's westernmost [[Teleport Waypoint]]. This area contains a {{Enemy|Stonehide Lawachurl}}, {{Enemy|Wooden Shieldwall Mitachurl}}, {{Enemy|Blazing Axe Mitachurl}} and four Hilichurls. If the enemies are engaged, the hilichurls will despawn.

===Etymology===
* Elynas was a fictional king of {{w|Alba}}ny and the father of {{w|Melusine|Mélusine}}.
